pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Mihomo Kernel packaged with OpenRC user services in mind.
It doesn't differ much from net-proxy/mihomo in gentoo-zh overlay, the only difference is that is provides user init-script and uses fcaps to set necessary capabilities, since OpenRC user services cannot declare them as system-wide services do.

use.flag: Compile with gvisor that implements the network protocol stack in user space, offering higher security and isolation
